definition: to change shift
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
surname Ban
team/class/squad/work shift/ranking/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for groups

sentences.english: IX. Strictly stick to the handing-over system.
sentences.chinese: 第九條嚴格執行交接班制度。

sentences.english: Ensuring the shift is reviewed and hand-over and briefings are carried out.
sentences.chinese: 確保每個班次的回顧交接班及例會的召開。

sentences.english: Changing of guard at Anit Kabir Mausoleum at Ataturk Monument.
sentences.chinese: 凱末爾紀念館，阿塔圖爾克雕像前的警衛交接班儀式。

sentences.english: The Drillers must exchange hand-over notes between each tour.
sentences.chinese: 每次交接班時，司鑽一定要交換交接班記錄。

sentences.english: The Drillers must exchange hand-over notes between each tour.
sentences.chinese: 每次交接班時，司鑽一定要交換交接班記錄。

sentences.english: Conducts shift briefings to ensure hotel activities and operational requirements are known.
sentences.chinese: 進行交接班說明工作，確定瞭解酒店活動和運營要求。

sentences.english: To carry out perfect shift hand over working and keep detailed working log.
sentences.chinese: 認真做好交接班工作，做好值班記錄。

sentences.english: Oversees and provides information for Shift Change between shift team.
sentences.chinese: 監督並在交接班的時候提供必要的信息。
